showWinStatus(String, String) - Method in class game.Game
Shows the Win or Lose status of a specified player in this round in a MessageDialog.
If the player won the game, the game ends for all players.
startRunning() - Method in class authentication.Client
Makes the connection to the server, sends it the data present in accountInfo and stores server response in the appropriate field according to the "type" of the message.
Suggestion - Class in game
A suggestion or accusation phrase, using a dropdown menu to select the intended person and weapon to suggest, in a JPanel.
Suggestion(String) - Constructor for class game.Suggestion
Creates the suggestion or accusation phrase according to the specified location and the input from the user to get the person and weapon.
